column2: "On 15 March 2022, a Russian aircraft bombed the settlement of Shostka, Sumy. An enterprise was destroyed. Casualties unknown."
"On 15 March 2022, Russian forces shot dead a man in Chkalovske, Kharkiv, and stole his car."
"Around 15 March 2022 (month of), a Russian soldier repeatedly raped a 29-year-old woman in Kharkiv region, and killed her old mother, when the daughter refused to go to Russia with the soldier."
